_xResult.title: Simple Song Blouse
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made ivory blouse with elegant piping
_xResult.longdesc:
This lovely sheer silk shirt in your wardrobe will complement your office outfits or stun on special occasions. The impeccable finishes and the detail of the green velvet piping give the simple style elevated elegance and finesse. Be creative and wear this made to measure piece with everything from a fine tulle skirt to simple washed jeans!


The shirt is sold together with a satin cami made of silk which you can also wear as a separate piece. The blouse can be decorated with rose embroidery upon request for a $10 customization fee. You need a blouse made custom to your measurements. You'll love the feeling of knowing it's made just for you and fits you perfectly!
